title: game keeps crashing?
body:
i have no clue what happened, left the house for 3 days and now league can only crash. can anyone help find out the problem
tried uninstalling and reinstalling and that still didnt help

replies.body:
Crashes can be caused by a number of different reasons. The most common cause is a connection issue to the servers, so I recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for common fixes. There is also a guide that goes over solutions for [bugsplat crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) if you're experiencing those specifically.

Let me know if you have any questions.
